name: change-series-settings
description: Change visualization settings for series on cartesian charts. Make sure that the visualization type is `line`, `bar`, `area`, or `combo` before calling this tool.

series_settings.description: Settings for series. Only include for series which you want to change. Every object in the array should have a key property that matches the series key in series_settings map. You must not include properties that should not be changed.

key.description: The series key in series_settings map.

color.description: The color of the series. You must use colors from the color palette only. If asked for a specific color, you must use a color from the palette only and select the closest match. When there are multiple series, you should try to use different colors for each series.

show_series_values.description: Whether to show the series values.

axis.description: Set the Y-axis of the series to left or right.

line.size.description: Set the thickness of a line series.

line.style.description: Set the style of the line.

line.interpolate.description: Set the interpolation method for the lines and areas only.

line.marker_enabled.description: Set whether to show the marker on the line and area series.

line.missing.description: Set the value how to handle missing data points.
